name: node-js-getting-started
description: A sample Node.js app using Express 4

scripts.build: npm run css && npm run js
scripts.watch: npm run build && parallelshell "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:js"
scripts.css: node-sass public/scss/main.scss public/css/main.css --output-style compressed && postcss --use autoprefixer public/css/*.css -d public/css/
